Package jester

package jester
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    GameObject
    Represents a generic game object with position, size, and visibility.
    GameObjectManager
     
    GameState
    Represents the game state, allowing for storage and retrieval of game data.
    Jester
     
    JesterColor
    JesterColor provides pre-defined and custom color utilities for use with the Jester framework.
    JesterGraphics
    JesterGraphics provides methods for rendering 2D graphics in the Jester framework.
    JesterInput
    JesterInput provides global static access to input handling classes.
    JesterKeyboard
    JesterKeyboard manages real-time key input for the Jester framework.
    JesterKeys
    JesterKeys is a static helper class that defines readable constants for keyboard keys using java.awt.event.KeyEvent values.
    JesterMain
     
    JesterMath
    JesterMath provides various mathematical functions and utilities, including random number generation, trigonometric functions, and more.
    JesterMouse
    JesterMouse provides mouse position and button input tracking for the Jester engine.
    JesterSystem
     
    JesterTimer
     
    JesterTransform
    Represents a 2D transformation using a 3x3 matrix.
    JesterVector2
    Represents a 2D vector with various mathematical operations.
    JesterWindow
    JesterWindow provides an abstraction over the main JFrame window used by the Jester framework.
    Scene
    The base class for all scenes.
    SignalBus
    The SignalBus class provides a simple event bus system for the Jester framework.
    SignalEmitter
    SignalEmitter allows objects to emit and listen for signals.
